candidates.why: Same coordinator shape (main-process, multi-phase), keyword-based mode detection, command-chain mapping, TODO/status tracking. Closest interaction model to ccw-plan.
Same 5-phase coordinator workflow (Analyze -> Select strategy -> Confirm -> Setup TODO/status -> Execute), similar tool surface and artifacts mindset.
Closest orchestration reference for building and executing a command chain with state persistence; overlaps with mode selection + sequential execution patterns.
System-level routing reference; explicitly relates ccw-plan to other coordinators and documents shared detection/selection principles.
Core planning command likely executed inside ccw-plan chains; useful for artifact expectations and plan/verify integration boundaries.

selected.why: Best match to the coordinator pattern and interaction model; use it to keep phases, evidence/pointers, and user-confirmation flow consistent.
